::Windlord/Nightlight::

Windlord put at Nightlight in ground and he moved to let at Aerotaur 
work.

Nighlight just saw t bots as if she coudn't understad what was going 
on there.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Aerotaur::
>     "Hmm.  Oh her name, Trinity asked her and she said it was 
Nightlight.  
> These pointed ears aren't just for looks, you know."  He looks over 
at 
> Trinity "No, little one, you are too small to give up your precious 
energy.  
> First it could end up hurting you, and second it wouldn't help you 
just don't 
> have enough energy in you.  I'll do it."  He reaches to his chest 
to extend a 
> cable.  This would have worked except that he was used to having a 
chest only 
> in robot mode.  Thus the cable didn't extend.  "Argh. blast it!"  
He once 
> again pulled his wings in and transformed into his robot mode, with 
the jet 
> black wings.  "Finally."  He opened a plate in his chest extending 
the 
> expected cable this time.  "Trinity.  Attach this cable to 
Nightlight for 
> me."  He tosses the end to her.
